name: DontGetCrushed
description:
Your hero is living in a simple, black and white colored world.

Pillars on the top and pillars on the bottom are the only things in this world.
And a timer.
If the timer runs out, the ceiling will fall down to crush your hero!
Its your job to detect the pillar which is small enough, to let you survive between the top and bottom ones.

You can collect special items to buy one additional life after you died 3 times. But care! They are not always on a save position.
